## Ray.intersectionTestTriangle() method

Do a ray triangle intersection test.

**Signature:**

```typescript
intersectionTestTriangle(v1: Vector3, v2: Vector3, v3: Vector3, cull: boolean): number | null;
```

</td><td>

The second triangle vertex.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

v3


</td><td>

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)


</td><td>

The third triangle vertex.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

cull


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Allow back side intersection if true.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number \| null

Distance from origin to the intersected point if the ray intersects with the triangle, otherwise null.
